description:
A lightweight binding that easily fine-tunes your ski’s performance, move it forward for more grip, backward for more glide. The heel plate adjusts to your boot size for maximum power transfer and better on-snow feeling.

  • Forward positions increase grip and rearward positions increase glide
  • Binding shifts easily with a single button, even with gloves on
  • Ergonomic lever opens widely and closes securely
  • Compatible with skis with premounted Prolink Shift plates. Mounting plate not included
  • Turnamic and NNN-compatible
name: Salomon Prolink Shift Classic Bindings - Unisex
